description: If you love Greek cuisine, you'll love this flavoursome lamb roast with whipped feta. Serve with these oregano roast potatoes.
keywords: Slow-Baked Lamb Shoulder with Whipped Feta
name: Slow-Baked Lamb Shoulder with Whipped Feta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Rest lamb for 10 minutes. Garnish with extra oregano. Serve with onion and whipped feta.
